com.magicbinder.data.base

Class SQLiteAdapterBase<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.magicbinder.data.base.SQLiteAdapterBase<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Entity type of this adapter.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SQLiteAdapter

    public abstract class SQLiteAdapterBase<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the base SQLiteAdapter. DO NOT MODIFY THIS CLASS AS IT IS REGENERATED This is the base class for all basic operations for your sqlite adapters.
